thread.title: U.S. Designing Secret Way to Monitor Iran’s Nuclear Program
thread.title_full: U.S. Designing Secret Way to Monitor Iran’s Nuclear Program - WSJ

author: Damian Paletta
title: U.S. Designing Secret Way to Monitor Iran’s Nuclear Program
text:
WASHINGTON—The U.S. intelligence chief said Wednesday that the government is designing a secret way to monitor Iran’s compliance with a pending agreement aimed at curbing its nuclear program, which will go beyond scrutiny from the International Atomic Energy Agency.
“We are fielding some independent capabilities, which I can’t go into…that will enable us to have good insight into the nuclear industrial enterprise of Iran, if I can call it that,” U.S. Director of National Intelligence James Clapper said at a Washington...
